attributes.additional_details:
Think about it this way ; We give more than Germany and Japan combined and they have much larger economies than us and they can afford it and we cant. and most of the countries we give to arent even greatfull! They always spit at us and complain about that we once enslaved them and all that politcally correct nonsense that their government has brainwashed them to believe.

Its not our fault if their government cant look after its own people , Why is it always the UK that must take the brunt of everything?

Personally the HM's Government needs to look after its own people before donating another penny, Why else are a servicemen dying , why else are peopled dying due to neglect of the NHS?

At any rate , Sign this pention if you think aid to other countries should be DECREASED and aid to countries with a space program and nuclear weapons should be stopped alltogether. BRITISH people should come first, not people from other countries.
